column4: hey guys I have a sprint phone, and need to be able to make a 3gpp (3g2) file for a ringtone.   http://hubpages.com/hub/DIY-video-ringtones-for-LG-Rumor    i have kdenlive installed ... any ideas?
I always use a free online tool to do media conversions...  http://media-convert.com/convert/  works like a charm
the audio needs to be mp4-aac
the audio needs to be mp4-aac
